name: Check what's trending in your niche on YouTube and gather creators and videos in one Google Sheet
description:
Streamline your YouTube competitor research with this automated data collection template. Simply input your niche search or hashtag YouTube URLs and this automation will scrape trending videos using Apify's YouTube scraper, then organize all the essential data into a clean Google Sheets table.
The template extracts key performance metrics including creator names, video titles, like counts, comment numbers, and direct video links - giving you a comprehensive overview of what's working in your space. Perfect for content creators, marketers, and agencies who need to track competitor performance and identify trending topics.
